description: meta info used by the Quantum Espresso parser, all names are expected to start with qe_

metaInfos.description: Name of program from Quantum Espresso suite
metaInfos.name: x_qe_program_name

metaInfos.description: Filename input was read from
metaInfos.name: x_qe_input_filename
x_qe_section_parallel
metaInfos.description: section for run-time parallization options of Quantum Espresso

metaInfos.name: x_qe_section_compile_options
metaInfos.description: section for compile-time options of Quantum Espresso
Maximum number of different atom species
metaInfos.name: x_qe_ntypx

metaInfos.description: Maximum dimension of radial grid
metaInfos.name: x_qe_ndmx

metaInfos.description: Maximum number of k-points
metaInfos.name: x_qe_npk

metaInfos.description: Maximum non local angular momentum
metaInfos.name: x_qe_lmaxx
x_qe_t_section_pp_report
metaInfos.description: section to collect 'pseudopotential report' information in new QE, used only for 'old', non-UPF pseudopotentials
Temporary: PP report: species number
metaInfos.name: x_qe_t_pp_report_species

metaInfos.description: Temporary: PP report: pp version
metaInfos.name: x_qe_t_pp_report_version

metaInfos.description: Temporary: PP report: parsed line
metaInfos.name: x_qe_t_pp_report_line

metaInfos.description: nthreads
metaInfos.name: x_qe_nthreads

metaInfos.description: Parallelization compile-time options
metaInfos.name: x_qe_compile_parallel_version

metaInfos.description: Bravais lattice index, constant during a run
metaInfos.name: x_qe_ibrav

metaInfos.description: Lattice Parameter 'a', constant during a run and used as unit in other quantities
metaInfos.name: x_qe_alat

metaInfos.description: Volume of unit cell
metaInfos.name: x_qe_cell_volume

metaInfos.description: Number of Atom species, a.k.a. unique Atom labels; a label may include symmetry-breaking suffices, e.g. 'Fe1' and 'Fe2', as some quantities can only prescribed per species and not per site
metaInfos.name: x_qe_number_of_species

metaInfos.description: Number of electrons in system
metaInfos.name: x_qe_number_of_electrons

metaInfos.description: Number of Kohn-Sham states/bands
metaInfos.name: x_qe_number_of_states

metaInfos.description: Cutoff for defining the direct-space grid used to represent charge densities. Conventionally 4*basis_set_planewave_cutoff, but much larger values may be required in case of Vanderbilt/Ultrasoft pseudopotentials and PAW
metaInfos.name: x_qe_density_basis_set_planewave_cutoff

metaInfos.description: Short name of User-enforced XC functional; overrides the setting implied by the pseudopotentials
metaInfos.name: x_qe_t_xc_functional_shortname_enforced

metaInfos.description: Convergence threshold for potentials
metaInfos.name: x_qe_potential_convergence_threshold

metaInfos.description: Mixing scheme: parameter beta
metaInfos.name: x_qe_potential_mixing_beta

metaInfos.description: Mixing scheme: number of previous iterations
metaInfos.name: x_qe_potential_mixing_iterations

metaInfos.description: Mixing scheme: type of mixing
metaInfos.name: x_qe_potential_mixing_scheme

metaInfos.description: True if the user enforced setting the XC functional; overrides the setting implied by the pseudopotentials
metaInfos.name: x_qe_xc_functional_user_enforced

metaInfos.description: Short name of XC functional used in calculation
metaInfos.name: x_qe_xc_functional_shortname

metaInfos.description: QE Index number representation of XC functional
metaInfos.name: x_qe_xc_functional_num

metaInfos.description: Name of XC functional component in Quantum Espresso context
metaInfos.name: x_qe_xc_name

metaInfos.description: Quantum Espresso comment about meaning of XC functional component
metaInfos.name: x_qe_xc_comment

metaInfos.description: Name of Index within Quantum Espresso where XC functional component was set from
metaInfos.name: x_qe_xc_index_name

metaInfos.description: Index value within Quantum Espresso where XC functional component was set from
metaInfos.name: x_qe_xc_index

metaInfos.description: Temporary storage for QE cell dimensions
metaInfos.name: x_qe_t_celldm

metaInfos.description: QE cell dimensions
metaInfos.name: x_qe_celldm

metaInfos.description: Temporary storage for direct lattice vectors, x-component
metaInfos.name: x_qe_t_vec_a_x

metaInfos.description: Temporary storage for direct lattice vectors, y-component
metaInfos.name: x_qe_t_vec_a_y

metaInfos.description: Temporary storage for direct lattice vectors, z-component
metaInfos.name: x_qe_t_vec_a_z

metaInfos.description: Temporary storage for reciprocal lattice vectors, x-component
metaInfos.name: x_qe_t_vec_b_x

metaInfos.description: Temporary storage for reciprocal lattice vectors, y-component
metaInfos.name: x_qe_t_vec_b_y

metaInfos.description: Temporary storage for reciprocal lattice vectors, z-component
metaInfos.name: x_qe_t_vec_b_z

metaInfos.description: Reciprocal Lattice vectors (in Cartesian coordinates). The first index runs over the $x,y,z$ Cartesian coordinates, and the second index runs over the 3 lattice vectors.
metaInfos.name: x_qe_reciprocal_cell

metaInfos.description: pseudo-section for collecting pseudopotential data (atomic number lookup requires table printed later in output)
